title: Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart, Steel Mesh Removable Sides, 3 cu ft, 400 lb Capacity, Green
descriptions:
Introducing the Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart, the perfect tool to make your gardening tasks easier than ever! This durable and reliable cart is designed with the needs of elderly folks in mind, ensuring that it is easily accessible and user-friendly for those who may be easily confused.

The frame of this garden cart is made of sturdy steel mesh, providing excellent durability and strength. The quick assembly feature allows you to start using the cart in no time, without any complicated setup processes. Plus, the side panels are removable, giving you the flexibility to customize the cart according to your needs.

One of the standout features of this cart is its convertible design. With just a few simple adjustments, you can easily transform it into a flatbed cart, allowing you to transport larger and bulkier items effortlessly.

The 10-inch pneumatic tires ensure smooth and easy maneuverability, while the tight turn radius and ample ground clearance make it easy to navigate through tight spaces and uneven terrain. The 4-wheel design provides stability and balance, ensuring that you can transport your gardening supplies and tools without any hassle.

With a generous capacity of 400 lbs, this cart can handle heavy loads with ease. The bed dimensions of 34 inches in length and 18 inches in width provide ample space to accommodate all your gardening essentials. The straight pull handle offers a comfortable grip, allowing you to effortlessly maneuver the cart around your garden.

Rest assured, this Gorilla Cart comes with a 1-year limited warranty, giving you peace of mind and confidence in your purchase. The overall height of 37 inches and weight of 36.6 pounds make it easy to handle and store when not in use. And let's not forget the vibrant green color, adding a touch of fun and style to your gardening experience.

Don't let the confusion of traditional gardening tools hold you back. Upgrade to the Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart and experience the convenience and ease it provides. Start enjoying your gardening activities with confidence and ease today!
